Author: Note
Garrett, Randall, 1927-1987, Silverberg,: This work was published under the name Gerald Vance, a pseudonym used by Randall Garrett, Robert Silverberg, Henry Slesar and Roger P. Graham.  The Internet Speculative Fiction Database attributes "The Judas Valley" to Randall Garrett and Robert Silverberg.
